title: There is a disconenct/login problem, and I want a loss forgiven
body:
It shows in my match history that I lost my last game. With all the issues going on at the time, I heard that loss forgivens were being given out. I want to know if I am going to get a loss forgiven for that my game that I was playing (Ranked, nonetheless) right in the middle of the issues.

Ping was screwy, chat disconencted at some point close to end of game (I think) and I couldn't get to my stats.

Please help!
